comment: At times his accent can be hard to understand, but will do his best to explain. Gives "motivation points" (extra credit). Doesn't post PP but if you get the foundations then the book can help. He likes to break up into groups and talk about sections and then discuss as a class. Homework is normally in groups and if you do it he gives full credit
Very sweet professor, very helpful, easy going VERY SMART

Very good professor! I loved his class. If you don't understand something, see him after class and he'll be happy to help. And come on, it's college people. If you are disturbing the class, or talking while he's talking, then he'll call you out.  If you do what you are supposed to do, then you won't havea problem.

Best professor I have ever had.  Anyone who thinks he's rude or difficult to understand should have your head examined- this is the real world, folks, not kindergarten! He's not there to hold your hand or wipe your nose.

this professor is absolutely awful. won't even let you stare off for too long without calling you out for being disrespectful. his expectations are absolutely ridiculous and he's full of himself. i would not recommend taking him at all unless you want to get yelled at everyday

Wang is sometimes hard to understand but when you listen he makes perfect sense. He makes jokes all the time in class and I love going to his class. I learn so much. For the previous responses...if you did not like this class then you might want to reconsider your major. He gives you 1 free absence then he starts deducting points. I reccomend him!
Hard to understand. He is extreemly rude and offensive! Test are easy if you are prepared for them. I wouldnt reccomend taking him.

TERRIBLE! Hard tests, hard projects, and BORING, too! He is VERY hard to understand, and then gets MAD when you ask him to clarify! He contradicts himself and doesn't explain ANYTHING, he just puts a bunch of notes on powerpoint! STRICT attendance policy!
